title: Out of the Darkness
description: When a wife calls 911 to report her husband has been shot on a country road in Texas, officers rush to the scene. Could the dramatic police footage end up being key in the investigation? Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on August 12, 2019.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
